title: APEA Akrotiri
text:
APEA FC (; "Αθλητική Ποδοσφαιρική Ένωση Ακρωτηρίου", Athlitiki Podosfairiki Enosi Akrotiri) is a Cypriot <a href="association%20football">football</a> club, based in <a href="Akrotiri%20%28village%29">Akrotiri</a>. The club currently compete in the <a href="STOK%20Elite%20Division">STOK Elite Division</a>.
History.
APEA FC was formed in 1955. In January 2020, the club was taken over by Dutch businessman Jamory Leysner. In May 2021, a portion of the club was purchased by American venture capitalist Rob Steiner.
